result.title: Codejam 2018 Pratice D Input set 2
result.content:
https://codejam.withgoogle.com/2018/challenges/0000000000000130/dashboard/0000000000000652

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

bool maxi(int atl, int atr, int l, int r){
    if(min(l, r) > min(atl, atr))
        return true;
    else if(min(l, r) == min(atl, atr)){
        if(max(l, r) > max(atl, atr))
            return true;
    }
    return false;
}


int main(){
    int n, k;
    scanf("%d %d", &n, &k);
    k--;
    multiset<int> t;
    t.insert(n);
    while(k--){
        auto x = t.end();
        x--;
        t.erase(x);
        t.insert(*x / 2);
        t.insert((*x - 1) / 2);
    }
    auto x = t.end();
    x--;
    printf("%d %d\n",*x / 2, (*x - 1) / 2);
}
